system.description:
Focus. Official kit of exorcists performing forensic work

on the classified bodies of mundane humans brought

into CAIN facilities. Some have been affected by

terrifying forces and require memory wipes post work.

Spend 1 KP to pull out one of the following:

Tweezers, compact magnifying scope, scalpel, sample

collector, antitoxin, compact breathing mask, wet wipes.
